items.sentence: I hope you know that the last thing I want to do is go there without your permission.
Tom certainly wouldn\'t be anywhere near as rich as he is if he hadn\'t married Mary.
Tom likes both Mary and Alice and can\'t decide who to ask to the dance this weekend.
Tom opened a new restaurant, but it didn\'t turn a profit in the first twelve months.
After Tom had eaten everything on his plate, he asked Mary if he could eat her salad.
